description: This file is a shell script used for configuring a GRE tunnel, managing network interfaces, and setting system parameters related to hotspot and GRE tunnels, including creating tunnels, managing sysevents, and applying iptables rules.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes snooper system events by enabling circuit and remote snooper logs.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Reads configuration parameters from PSM database related to GRE and hotspot settings.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates GRE tunnel and configures network interfaces, bridges, and veth pairs for tunneling.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Sets system events related to hotspot keep-alive parameters and enables hotspotfd features.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Configures iptables rules for the network bridges and traffic forwarding.

calls: ip link add gretap0 type gretap remote `sysevent get hotspotfd-tunnelEP` local "`ifconfig -a eth0 | grep inet | grep -v inet6 | tr -s " " | cut -d ":" -f2 | cut -d " " -f1`" ttl 255 dev $WAN_IF
